verbose_text: Cortisol levels were low and statistically similar between controls (5.5 +/-0.7 ng ml -1) and immediately after the applied stressors, but increased significantly to 54.7 +/-7.8 ng ml -1 after 1 h of recovery, and remained elevated at statistically similar values after 3 h. Lactate increased significantly from 0.06 +/-0.01 mM in controls to 0.31 +/-0.09 mM after the chase protocol, but returned to control values after 1 h of recovery.
